tasks.label: Run dev-tools image (on Windows)
tasks.command: if (!(docker ps -a --format '{{.Names}}' | Select-String -Quiet ${config:container_name})) { docker pull ${config:docker_image} ; docker run --privileged -e DISPLAY="host.docker.internal:0" -v "${workspaceFolder}:/app" -t -d --name ${config:container_name} ${config:docker_image} }

tasks.label: Run dev-tools image (on macOS)
tasks.command: docker ps -a --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q ${config:container_name} || (xhost +localhost && docker pull ${config:docker_image} && docker run --privileged -e DISPLAY='host.docker.internal:0' -v '/tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix' -v '${workspaceFolder}:/app' -t -d --name ${config:container_name} ${config:docker_image})

tasks.label: Run dev-tools image (on Linux)
tasks.command: docker ps -a --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q ${config:container_name} || (xhost +localhost && docker pull ${config:docker_image} && docker run --privileged -e DISPLAY='host.docker.internal:0' -v '/dev/bus/usb:/dev/bus/usb' -v '/tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix' -v '${workspaceFolder}:/app' -t -d --name ${config:container_name} ${config:docker_image})

tasks.label: Build app [debug]
tasks.command: docker exec -it ${config:container_name} bash -c 'export BOLOS_SDK=${input:sdk} && make -j DEBUG=1'

tasks.label: Load app on device (Linux)
tasks.command: if [ ! -f '/etc/udev/rules.d/${config:linux_udev_ledgerblue_rule_file}' ]; then sudo cp .vscode/${config:linux_udev_ledgerblue_rule_file} /etc/udev/rules.d/ && sudo udevadm control --reload-rules && sudo udevadm trigger; fi && docker exec -it ${config:container_name} bash -c 'export BOLOS_SDK=${input:sdk} && make load'

tasks.label: Load app on device (macOS)
tasks.command: cmd="[ -d 'ledger' ] || python3 -m virtualenv ledger && source ledger/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install ledgerblue && python3 -m ledgerblue.runScript --scp --fileName bin/app.apdu --elfFile bin/app.elf"; if python3 -m virtualenv --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then eval "${cmd}"; else python3 -m pip install virtualenv && eval "${cmd}"; fi

tasks.label: Load app on device (Windows)
tasks.command: cmd.exe /C 'if exist ledger (call ledger\Scripts\activate.bat && python -m ledgerblue.runScript --scp --fileName bin/app.apdu --elfFile bin/app.elf) else (python -m pip install virtualenv && python -m venv ledger && call ledger\Scripts\activate.bat && python -m pip install ledgerblue && python -m ledgerblue.runScript --scp --fileName bin/app.apdu --elfFile bin/app.elf)'
